creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his family and friends
description: circular basket on circular beaded and bright-cut engraved foot; urn shaped body engraved with floral bands and swags and pierced with rosettes, filleting and tassels; beaded lip and swing handle; engraved underside of foot: L.I.H; fully marked on underside
inscription:
Mark; Inscription

Initials [L.I.H.] on underside of foot.  The outside engraved with the family crest of a two-headed eagle displayed (unidentified, used by many families in England).
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of foot.
title: Sugar basket
